ctu_text:
The scheme has been introduced with an aim to compensate direct costs of girl education at all levels, especially for such girls who happen to be the only girl child in their families.
The objectives of the proposed scheme are: a) To support the postgraduate education of single girl children in postgraduate courses only. b) To recognize the value of observance of the small family norms.
The candidates are required to apply online on National Scholarship Portal after initiation of the application process and notice to be published on the UGC website.
